title: Anyone know when Season 6 fully starts? For us AND for LCS?

replies.body: Should be on Wednesday with patch 6.1

Shiet Wednesday? Got two days to get to Gold for that sweet soft ranked reset

Or is that not how it works? Lol
The MMR you gain during pre-season will definitely boost your seeding during placements, but getting Gold in pre-season doesn't necessarily mean you'll get Gold after placements.
Ahhh thanks dude! I'll keep that in mind, though, I still wanna try and get to Gold, for myself, even though it's not _real_
